content.question: Both axes range from 0 to 7 in increments of 1. The first vector is shown with the tail at (1 comma 1) and the tip at (3 comma 5). This first vector is shown as a solid arrow. A second vector is shown with the tail at (1 comma 1) and the tip at (4 comma 2). This second vector is shown as a solid arrow. A third vector represented as a dashed arrow is shown with the tail at (4 comma 2) and the tip at (6 comma 6). This third vector is a translation of the first vector. A fourth vector represented as a dashed arrow is shown with the tail at (3 comma 5) and the tip at (6 comma 6). This fourth vector is a translation of the second vector. The figure shows a parallelogram spanned by two vectors in the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane. Which of the following gives the area of the parallelogram?
